SBG Software (treatments) File List

Here is a list of all documented files with brief descriptions:
adaptive_insert.cxxImplementation of (one iteration of) the adaptive insertion heuristic
adaptive_insert.h [code]Header for adaptive insertion heuristic
AdaptiveInsertion.h [code]Class that encapsulates the adaptive insertion heuristic
Barycenter.h [code]Class that implements the barycenter heuristic
bfs_heuristic.cxxImplementation of bfs-based heuristic: guided breadth-first search
bfs_heuristic.h [code]Header for bfs-based heuristic: guided breadth-first search
BiGraph.cxxBipartite graph class for crossing number problem
BiGraph.hxx [code]Bipartite graph class for crossing number problem (header)
CmdLine.cppImplementation of command-line parser
CmdLine.h [code]Header for a class that parses the command line
defs.h [code]Definitions common to all edge crossing heuristic source files
dot.cxxModule for reading files in .dot format
dot.h [code]Module for reading files in .dot format
dot2dre.cxxReads a .dot file and outputs the same file in .dre format (for use with the dreadnaught isomorphism testing program)
fstats.cxxCompile simple statistics for experimental data
gstats.cxxReports various statitics about a bigraph in dot format
heuristic.cppImplements heuristics for edge crossings
IntSet.cppSet of integers for use with graph adjacency lists
IntSet.h [code]Set of integers for representing adjacency lists in graphs
IterativeHeuristic.h [code]Abstract class for all heuristics that iterate until some condition is satisfied while updating the order on each side during an iteration
mainpage.h [code]The "Main Page"
Median.h [code]Class that implements the median heuristic
ord.cxxImplementation of utility functions that read and write .ord files (node ordering on layers of a graph)
ord.h [code]Header for utility functions that read and write .ord files (node ordering on layers of a graph)
plain_bfs.cxxImplementation of a breadth-first search
plain_bfs.h [code]Header for plain bfs ordering
Queue.hxx [code]Queue of integers, implemented as a linked list, used for breadth-first search
sbg_cn_eval.cxxReports number of crossings for a graph, given an ord file
SortingHeuristic.cppBase class for all the averaging heuristics for edge crossing minimization, e.g., median and barycenter
SortingHeuristic.h [code]Base class for all the averaging heuristics for edge crossing minimization, e.g., median and barycenter; simplifies the control
Sums.cxxData structure for efficient retrieval and update of sums of contiguous integers in an indexed list, used to compute crossing numbers
Sums.hxx [code]Data structure for efficient retrieval and update of sums of contiguous integers in an indexed list, used to compute crossing numbers
Timer.hxx [code]Header file for getting timing info
tree_lower_bound.cxxImplementation of lower bound for trees
tree_lower_bound.h [code]Header for tree lower bound calculation
